data.actual_result: You're taken to a point which is around 35~40 messages away from the blocked message.
data.expected_result: You're taken to the spot where the message is or at least near to it.
data.short_description: When you search messages from a blocked user and click on it, you are taken to a random spot (not quite) near the blocked message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Block a user. - Search a message by them. - Click on the message.
